I also detected a Trojan Virus in the exe file with McAfee.  I really need this program and don't have the outrageous $400 price tag for it.  Does anyone know of a serial crack keygen or patch that will work?  This one may work, but will my computer be infected with a Trojan? I have been searching with no luck so far.

Detected a trojan/virus? You shouldn't be worried about it. 

Cracked files/keygen files have always been labeled as malware by most anti-malware companies because of their nature to "hack through" program settings and alter it illegally.

But don't be alarmed, it's just a false-positive scan result. It's true that the patch is a trojan because it gives you "illegal access" to the program encryption. The patch is also considered a virus because it lets you alter the program illegal and what anti-malware companies would call "corrupting" the program code. 

I assure those who use the patch that it's safe.

*malware = programs/scripts that do harm or give unauthorized access to someone's computer. Examples are trojans, computer virus, worms, spyware, keyloggers, rootkits, crimeware. for more info: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malware

This torrent no longer works (as of January 2010) because the link to the original patch provided by BvvM is no longer available (it's just a movie file at that location now).
